entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Apsley
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 07:30 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 09:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 70 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -7.8°C
Wind: WSW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending early this morning then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 2 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 8 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
